result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:43 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Eugenio David Zezza in court.  Attorney Robert A Wertheimer in court for Eugenio David Zezza.  Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CM275 & 22CM529.  Court reviews file.  Atty Wertheimer states he was just appointed to new file asking for one more PTC to review file. Court appoints Atty Wertheimer to 22CM529.  Court schedules another PSC. Adjourned at 9:45 AM. bph
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Pre-trial/scheduling conference on October 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Eugenio David Zezza
Current: 308 7th Street N, Hudson, WI 54016 United States  (Effective: 09-02-2022)
Prior: 710 8th Street N, Apt. 2, Hudson, WI 54016 
Per BOND.

- Includes 22CM275 & 22CM529

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required be fitted with a SCRAM alcohol testing unit and further understand I am to submit to random alcohol testing at least THREE times per day. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

1:43 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: B Harris,  Defendant Eugenio David Zezza in court, in custody.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Eugenio David Zezza.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  DE does not qualify for PD.  DE has another file in Branch III, Court to have Atty Wertheimer appointed to this case also, both cases to be set on one payment plan.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.
